General.Name: Bioscience Animal Health PCL
General.Description: Bioscience Animal Health Public Company Limited trades in animal pharmaceutical, feed additive, and raw material products for livestock, aquaculture, and pet markets in Thailand. The company operates through Animal Health, Nutrition, Ingredient, Complete Feed, Diagnostic, and Others. It offers bioscience products, such as antibiotics, additives, injections, mold inhibitors, and water-soluble products, as well as vaccines; feed additives, disinfectants, and amino acids; medical supplies and diagnostic tools; and animal health and nutrition products, as well as Kits and equipments. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
